#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
 
int main()
{
	
	
	int t;
	int n;
	int d[100000];
	int i, j, k, ans, b;
	int flag;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	
	while(t--) {
		
		
		scanf("%d", &n);
		
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			
			scanf("%d", &d[i]);
			
		}
		b = 0;
		sort(d, d + n);
		k = 1;
		flag = 1;
		ans = 0;
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			
			b++;
			if(d[i] >= (k)) {
				
				if(b % 6 == 0) {
					k = k + 2;
				} else {
					k++;
				}
				//continue;
			} else {
				flag = 0;
				ans = i;
				break;
			}
			
			
		}
		
		if(flag == 1) {
			printf("Bhai Ho!\n");
		} else {
			printf("Killed %d\n", ans);
		}
		
		
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
